item.description:
Difficulty: easy

Meet spot: Gate 41

I put 185 Park St, Clinton, MA, into Google Maps because I was able to get the dead-end of the road that way...but 185 is a house. Anyway, the yellow gate is right there, because there is a photo of it on Google Maps. Don't block the gate.

Map of gates and fire roads: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/watersupply/watershed/maphome.htm#Wachusett%20Reservoir

Details:

We'll hike from near the Wachusett Dam west along the fire road to the North Dike. It's about 2.5 miles one-way, and it's all along the shoreline and over the Dike. It's not a loop, so we can walk as far as everyone wants and come back.

Bring something to drink and a lunch or snacks. We can eat on the dike. According to the weather yesterday, it should be nice (as it was today). Dress for comfortable and breezy weather.

Regulations:

No swimming, wading, or animals; it's a public water supply. Take your trash with you when you leave.
item.how_to_find_us: Park Street dead-ends in front of a yellow gate (Gate 41). I drive a white Dodge Stratus. Do not block the gate.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: North Dike @ Wachusett Reservoir
